benchmark_details.name: Multimodal Multi-image Reasoning Benchmark (MMRB)
benchmark_details.overview: MMRB is the first benchmark designed to evaluate structured visual reasoning across multiple images. It comprises 92 sub-tasks covering spatial, temporal, and semantic reasoning, with annotations generated by GPT-4o and refined by human experts.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a comprehensive evaluation of the reasoning capabilities of Multimodal Large Language Models (MLLMs) in multi-image contexts.

data.source: Collected from prior multi-image datasets and benchmarks, specifically curated for multi-image reasoning tasks.
data.annotation: Generated by GPT-4o with human refinement for accuracy.

methodology.calculation: Metrics were calculated based on correct reasoning paths compared to generated outputs.
methodology.interpretation: The accuracy reflects the correctness of generated reasoning paths compared to annotated ground truths.
methodology.validation: Extensive evaluation on 40 MLLMs, including reasoning-specific and multimodal reward models.
